text: Kɨ gari, Godɨn Nguibam kuiaghrɨzɨ, hoziar ghurghurir mam iti. Gumazir hoziar kam gisɨn aperaghav itim, an ziamning kamakɨn, “Gumazir dughiaba bar God baghavɨra itim,” ko “Gumazir uan akar dɨkɨrɨziba mɨgeima da otivim.” A gumazamizibar araziba deravɨra da tuisɨgha mɨdorozim fora arazir aghuimra gɨn ghua a gami.
